created_at.description: The date and time when the catalog product group was created.

description.description: The description of the catalog product group.

feed_id.description: The ID of the feed associated with the catalog product group.

id.description: The unique identifier of the catalog product group.

is_featured.description: Indicates whether the product group is featured or not.

name.description: The name of the catalog product group.

status.description: The status of the catalog product group.

type.description: The type of the catalog product group.

updated_at.description: The date and time when the catalog product group was last updated.
